name: ELK-Stack
description: The ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) is a powerful open-source platform for searching, analyzing, and visualizing log data in real time. Elasticsearch provides distributed search and analytics, Logstash collects and processes data, and Kibana offers interactive visualization and exploration.

notes.text: Installation takes 10-20 minutes (~2GB download). Interactive prompts will pause for your input.
You will be prompted to choose: [1] Full HTTPS (recommended), [2] Backend HTTPS only, or [3] No SSL (testing only).
Optional: Customize JVM heap sizes (defaults: Elasticsearch 2GB, Logstash 1GB). Minimum 8GB container RAM required.
After installation, get credentials with: pct exec <CONTAINER_ID> -- cat /root/elk-credentials.txt
Security configured automatically: Unique passwords, SSL certificates, API keys in keystores.
Access Kibana at http://<CONTAINER_IP>:5601. Username: elastic, password in credentials file.
